name: Unidentified Flying Ostrich
description:
Reach the top of the mountain, to help Ostrich live his dream of taking flight. Make sure you collect enough feathers or Ostrich may not enjoy his trip.

This game and the assets used were created completely from scratch (excluding music, sound effects and fonts) over a six day period for Weekly Game Jam 238 (theme: UFO).

Controls:

-A/D to move left/right

-Space/W to jump

-S to crouch

-M to mute/unmute

Credits:

Artist: Sam Blackwood

Programmer/Animator: Bella Blackwood

Music: www.bensound.com
